title.content-text: 1.2.3 - Switch Features in a Hierarchical Network

brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts Distribution Layer switch features.

Network Topology: Same as Diagram 1. Switches D1 and D2 are identified as Distribution Layer switches.
Distribution Layer switch features include Layer 3 support, high forwarding rate, Gigabit Ethernet, which is also referred to as 10 Gigabit Ethernet, redundant components, security policies or access control lists, link aggregation, and Q o S.
